TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration extends System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 定义安全象征服务的配置 (STS)。

span.span: Defines the configuration for a security token service (STS).

summary.span: 实现 STSs 从 类派生的类。

span.span: Classes that implement STSs derive from the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 主题中使用的代码示例取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记（SWT），并包括能够为 SWT 标记提供服务的被动 STS 实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，可以参阅 `Federation Metadata` 示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例以及可用于 WIF 的其他示例以及要从何处下载这些示例和其他示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示了 类的自定义实现，以支持处理 SWT 令牌的被动 STS。The following code shows a custom implementation of the class to support a passive STS that processes SWT tokens. 首次访问 static `Current` 属性时，将初始化配置并将其存储到 HTTP 应用程序状态。The configuration is initialized and stored in the HTTP application state the first time the static `Current` property is accessed. 构造函数使用自定义 STS 的类型、自定义颁发者标记解析程序和默认标记类型（SWT 标记类型的 URI）初始化自定义配置的属性。The constructor initializes the properties of the custom configuration with the type of the custom STS, a custom issuer token resolver, and the default token type (the URI of the SWT token type). 它还将 SWT 标记处理程序添加到默认处理程序集合。It also adds an SWT token handler to the default handler collection. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/customsecuritytokenserviceconfiguration.cs#2)] 下面的代码演示如何通过从 `default.aspx.cs` 文件的隐藏代码中调用 方法来调用自定义被动 STS 来处理 WS 联合身份验证请求。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. 方法使用在前面的示例中所示的 `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` 类上设置的属性初始化 `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` 类的实例。The method initializes an instance of the `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` class using the properties set on the `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` class shown in the previous example. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

summary.span: 从 属性中指定的 创建安全标记服务 (STS) 实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性中指定的类必须实现采用 类型的参数的构造函数。The class specified in the property must implement a constructor that takes a parameter of type . ## Examples 主题中使用的代码示例取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code examples that are used in the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了一些自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记（SWT），并包括能够为 SWT 标记提供服务的被动 STS 实现。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT) and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关如何实现活动 STS 的示例，可以参阅 `Federation Metadata` 示例。For an example of how to implement an active STS, you can see the `Federation Metadata` sample. 有关这些示例以及可用于 WIF 的其他示例以及要从何处下载这些示例和其他示例的信息，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about these samples and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示了 类的自定义实现，以支持处理 SWT 令牌的被动 STS。The following code shows a custom implementation of the class to support a passive STS that processes SWT tokens. 首次访问 static `Current` 属性时，将初始化配置并将其存储到 HTTP 应用程序状态。The configuration is initialized and stored in the HTTP application state the first time the static `Current` property is accessed. 构造函数使用自定义 STS 的类型、自定义颁发者标记解析程序和默认标记类型（SWT 标记类型的 URI）初始化自定义配置的属性。The constructor initializes the properties of the custom configuration with the type of the custom STS, a custom issuer token resolver, and the default token type (the URI of the SWT token type). 它还将 SWT 标记处理程序添加到默认处理程序集合。It also adds an SWT token handler to the default handler collection. 下面的代码演示如何通过从 `default.aspx.cs` 文件的隐藏代码中调用 方法来调用自定义被动 STS 来处理 WS 联合身份验证请求。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. 方法使用在当前 `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` 对象上设置的属性初始化 `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` 类的实例。The method initializes an instance of the `PassiveSTS.CustomSecurityTokenService` class using the properties set on the current `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` object. `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.Current` 属性由 `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` 类实现，并返回在 HTTP 应用程序状态中保存的类的实例。The `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.Current` property is implemented by the `CustomSecurityTokenServiceConfiguration` class and returns the instance of the class that is saved in the HTTP application state. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultMaxSymmetricKeySizeInBits { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.DefaultMaxSymmetricKeySizeInBits : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置如果选中，则请求中指定的 KeySize 是否位于此限制内的默认密钥大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the default key size limit in bits used check if the KeySize specified in the request is within this limit.

value.span: 默认密钥大小限制（以位为单位）。

span.span: The default key size limit, in bits.
The default is 1024.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这仅适用于对称密钥情况。This only applies to the symmetric key case.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int DefaultSymmetricKeySizeInBits { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.DefaultSymmetricKeySizeInBits : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发的令牌中使用的默认密钥大小（位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the default key size in bits used in the issued token.

value.span: 在颁发的令牌中使用的密钥大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The key size used in the issued token, in bits.
The default is 256.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这仅适用于对称密钥情况。This only applies to the symmetric key case.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan DefaultTokenLifetime { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.DefaultTokenLifetime : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置颁发的令牌中使用的默认生命周期。

span.span: Gets or sets the default lifetime used in the issued tokens.

value.span: 要在已颁发令牌中使用的默认生存期。

span.span: The default lifetime to use in issued tokens.
The default is 1 day.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultTokenType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DefaultTokenType : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置令牌颁发中使用的默认令牌类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the default token type that is used in token issuance.

value.span: 一个字符串，其中包含默认标记类型。

span.span: A string that contains the default token type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串值以 URI 格式指定;例如，对于 SAML 1.1 令牌类型，以下为字符串值： `http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1`。The string values are specified in URI format; for example, for the SAML 1.1 token type, the following is the string value: `http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/oasis-wss-saml-token-profile-1.1#SAMLV1.1`. 默认标记类型设置为 SAML 1.1。The default token type is set to SAML 1.1.

span.span: The specified value is or empty.

exception.span: 指定值未在标记处理程序中定义。

span.span: The specified value is not defined in the token handlers.

value.span: 若要 STS 启用 WSDL 生成，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to enable WSDL generation for the STS; otherwise, .
The default is .

value.span: 用于颁布令牌的最长令牌生命期。

span.span: The maximum token lifetime for issued tokens.
The default is 1 day.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ SigningCredentials { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置签名凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the signing credentials.
The signing credentials.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 实现有效的安全令牌服务 (STS) 时，将忽略 属性。The property is ignored when implementing an active security token service (STS). 相反，您必须通过承载您的 STS 的服务主机上的 属性设置服务证书。Instead you must set the service certificate through the property on the service host that is hosting your STS. 用于有效的 STS 的服务主机由 类表示。The service host used for an active STS is represented by the class.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为 或者空字符串。
